head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MERCURIO, CARL A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MERCURIO, CARL A.

block.p: MERCURIO-Carl A. On April 26, 1998. Retired IBM executive. Beloved son of the late Rocco and Lillian Mercurio. Devoted husband of Joan (nee DeMaio). Loving father of Carl, Rocco and Sabrina Mercurio. Caring brother of Lucille Watts. Dear father-in-law of Joan and Michiru. Adored grandfather of Ryan Mercurio. Visiting Tuesday and Wednesday 2-4, and 7-9 PM at Leo P. Gallagher & Son Funeral Home, 2900 Summer Street, Stamford, CT. Funeral Thursday, April 30, 10AM. Mass of Resurrection at St. Luke's R.C. Church in Westport, CT., 11 AM. For further information please call Frank E. Campbell at 212-288-3500
